casebody.data:
In re Appropriation for Highway Purposes: Masheter, Director of Highways, Appellee, v. Leach et al., Appellants.

[Cite as Masheter, Dir. of Hwys., v. Leach, 5 Ohio St. 2d 257.]

(No. 39683 Decided March 23, 1966.) *258Mr. William B. Saoobe, attorney general, Mr. 1. Charles Rhoads and Mr. Harry R. Paulino, for appellee. Mr. Robert E. Wright, for appellants. Per Curiam.

The judgment of the Court of Appeals is affirmed on the grounds and for the reasons stated in Masheter, Dir. of Hwys., v. Junk, supra.

Judgment affirmed.

Taut, C. J., Zimmerman, Matthias, O’Neill, Herbert, Schneider and Brown, JJ., concur.
